sentences.en: Don't try to outshine others. They can oust you from office , mind you.
sentences.cn: 你别太突出了,小心别人掐你的尖儿.

sentences.en: He always parades his superiority and strives to outshine others.
Jesse has begun to outshine me in sports.
sentences.cn: 杰西在体育方面开始超过我。

sentences.en: Most sealants are acrylic polymer formulas that outshine and outlast the most expensive waxes.
sentences.cn: 多数密封胶是丙烯酸聚合体,比昂贵的蜡还要闪亮,耐久.

sentences.en: Several new players outshone the veterans.
sentences.cn: 几名新选手使老将们黯然失色。

sentences.en: She has feature that can outshine the moon and put the flowers to shame.

sentences.cn: 在这欢乐的时节给你我最真的祝福和亲切的思念,愿你今年的新年比往年更璀璨.

words.tran_cn: 使相形见绌；胜过；比…更亮

trans.tran_cn: 比…光亮； 出色， 优异
